data.title: Nyerere Against Islam in Zanzibar and Tanganyika
data.meta_description:
Nyerere Against Islam in Zanzibar and Tanganyika - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. 1) The document discusses Julius Nyerere's opposition to Islam in Zanzibar and Tanganyika after independence from British colonial rule. 

2) It describes how under the Zanzibar Sultanate, Zanzibar was an intellectual center for the spread of Islam in East Africa through schools and mosques. Nyerere, a devout Catholic, saw this as a threat to the spread of Christianity. 

3) After independence, Nyerere orchestrated the Zanzibar Revolution to unite Zanzibar and Tanganyika into Tanzania. This continued the crusade against Islam and extended Christian colonial influence in the region by isolating the Islamic influence of Zanzibar
